TopicTitle: Wing collided into Launchpad - In Flight and out of Physics range!!

Articles.Content:
Hi! So I'm reentering my plane and come down quite nicely close to the KSC. I'm about 5-10 km out and suddenly bam - wing part goes poof. I thought it just overheated (granted, I came down a bit hard).

But no, the Flight log says it collided... Into the launchpad? While I am mid-flight, 5 km away (which should be out of physics range, no?)

Old, old bug. No fix besides quicksave -> exit game -> restart game -> load save.

Sorry I can't be more helpfull, 'tis something that has been bugging me for a long time too.
